name: Mastery Talisman: Counterattack Spirit
description: Your characters with 7 HP or less deal +2 DMG. Your characters with 4 HP or less deal +1 additional DMG.
descriptionraw: Your characters with 7 HP or less deal +2 DMG. Your characters with 4 HP or less deal +1 additional DMG.
descriptionreplaced: Your characters with 7 HP or less deal +2 DMG. Your characters with 4 HP or less deal +1 additional DMG.
